00044 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_load_so(dfsch_object_t* ctx, 
00045                               char* so_name, 
00046                               char* sym_name){
00047   void *handle;
00048   dfsch_object_t* (*entry)(dfsch_object_t*);
00049   char* err;
00050 
00051   err = dlerror();
00052 
00053   handle = dlopen(so_name, RTLD_NOW);
00054 
00055   err = dlerror();
00056   if (err){
00057     dfsch_error("dlopen() failed", dfsch_make_string_cstr(err));
00058   }
00059 
00060   entry = dlsym(handle, sym_name);
00061 
00062   err = dlerror();
00063   if (err){
00064     dfsch_error("dlsym() failed", dfsch_make_string_cstr(err));
00065   }
00066   
00067   entry(ctx);
00068 
00069   return DFSCH_SYM_TRUE;
00070 }
00071 
00072 typedef struct import_ctx_t {
00073   dfsch_object_t* head;
00074   dfsch_object_t* tail;
00075 } import_ctx_t;
00076 
00077 static int load_callback(dfsch_object_t *obj, void* ctx){
00078 
00079   dfsch_object_t* new_tail = dfsch_cons(obj, NULL);
00080 
00081   if (!((import_ctx_t*)ctx)->head){
00082     ((import_ctx_t*)ctx)->head = new_tail;
00083   }else{
00084     dfsch_set_cdr(((import_ctx_t*)ctx)->tail, new_tail);
00085   }
00086 
00087   ((import_ctx_t*)ctx)->tail = new_tail;
00088 
00089   return 1;
00090 }
00091 
00092 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_load_scm(dfsch_object_t* ctx, 
00093                                char* fname){
00094   return dfsch_eval_proc(dfsch_read_scm(fname, ctx), ctx);
00095 }

00097 static int qs_strcmp(const void* a, const void* b){ /* To suppress warning */
00098   return strcmp(*((char**)a), *((char**)b));
00099 }
00100 
00101 static char** my_scandir(char* dirname){
00102   char **buf;
00103   size_t allocd;
00104   size_t count;
00105   DIR *dir;
00106   struct dirent* e;
00107 
00108   buf = GC_MALLOC(sizeof(char*)*16);
00109   allocd = 16;
00110 
00111   dir = opendir(dirname);
00112   if (!dir){
00113     return NULL;
00114   }
00115 
00116   count = 0;
00117 
00118   while((e = readdir(dir))){
00119     if (count >= (allocd - 1)){
00120       allocd *= 2;
00121       buf = GC_REALLOC(buf, sizeof(char*) * allocd);
00122     }
00123 
00124     buf[count] = stracpy(e->d_name);
00125     count++;
00126   }
00127 
00128   qsort(buf, count, sizeof(char*), qs_strcmp);
00129 
00130   buf[count] = NULL;
00131   return buf;
00132 }
00133 
00134 static char* get_module_symbol(char* name){
00135   str_list_t* l = sl_create();
00136   char* buf = stracpy(name);
00137   char* i = buf;
00138 
00139   while(*i){
00140     if (!strchr("abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789", *i)){
00141       *i = '_';
00142     }
00143     i++;
00144   }
00145   
00146   sl_append(l, "dfsch_module_");
00147   sl_append(l, buf);
00148   sl_append(l, "_register");
00149 
00150   return sl_value(l);
00151 }

00153 typedef struct builtin_module_t {
00154   char* name;
00155   void (*register_proc)(dfsch_object_t* env);
00156 } builtin_module_t;
00157 
00158 static builtin_module_t builtin_modules[] = {
00159   {"introspect", dfsch_introspect_register},
00160 };
00161 
00162 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_load(dfsch_object_t* env, char* name, 
00163                            dfsch_object_t* path_list){
00164   struct stat st;
00165   dfsch_object_t* path;
00166   char *pathpart;
00167   char *fname;
00168   str_list_t* l;
00169   int i;
00170 
00171   for (i = 0; i < sizeof(builtin_modules) / sizeof(builtin_module_t); i++){
00172     if (strcmp(builtin_modules[i].name, name) == 0){
00173       builtin_modules[i].register_proc(env);
00174       return NULL;
00175     }
00176   }
00177 
00178   if (path_list){
00179     path = path_list;
00180   } else {
00181     path = dfsch_env_get_cstr(env, "load:*path*");
00182     if (path)
00183       path = dfsch_car(path);
00184   }
00185 
00186   while (dfsch_pair_p(path)){
00187     l = sl_create();
00188     sl_append(l, dfsch_string_to_cstr(dfsch_car(path)));
00189     sl_append(l, "/");
00190     sl_append(l, name);
00191     pathpart = sl_value(l);
00192     if (stat(pathpart, &st) == 0){ 
00193       if (S_ISREG(st.st_mode) || S_ISLNK(st.st_mode)){
00194         if (strcmp(".so", pathpart+strlen(pathpart)-3) == 0){
00195           return dfsch_load_so(env, pathpart, get_module_symbol(name));       
00196         } else {
00197           return dfsch_load_scm(env, pathpart);
00198         }
00199       }
00200       if (S_ISDIR(st.st_mode)){
00201         char** list = my_scandir(pathpart);
00202         
00203         while(*list){
00204           l = sl_create();
00205           sl_append(l, pathpart);
00206           sl_append(l, "/");
00207           sl_append(l, *list);
00208           
00209           if (strcmp(".so", (*list)+strlen(*list)-3) == 0){
00210             dfsch_load_so(env, fname, get_module_symbol(name));       
00211           } else {
00212             dfsch_load_scm(env, fname);
00213           }
00214           
00215           list++;
00216         }
00217         return NULL;
00218       }
00219     }
00220     fname = stracat(pathpart, ".scm");
00221     if (stat(fname, &st) == 0 && (S_ISREG(st.st_mode) || S_ISLNK(st.st_mode))){
00222       return dfsch_load_scm(env, fname);              
00223     }
00224     fname = stracat(pathpart, ".so");
00225     if (stat(fname, &st) == 0 && (S_ISREG(st.st_mode) || S_ISLNK(st.st_mode))){
00226       return dfsch_load_so(env, fname, get_module_symbol(name));              
00227     }
00228     
00229     path = dfsch_cdr(path);
00230   }
00231   
00232   dfsch_error("Module not found", dfsch_make_string_cstr(name));
00233 }
00234 
00235 static int search_modules(dfsch_object_t* modules, char* name){
00236   while(modules){
00237     if (strcmp(name, dfsch_string_to_cstr(dfsch_car(modules))) == 0){
00238       return 1;
00239     }
00240     modules = dfsch_cdr(modules);
00241   }
00242   return 0;
00243 }
00244 
00245 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_require(dfsch_object_t* env, char* name, dfsch_object_t* path_list){
00246   dfsch_object_t* modules = dfsch_env_get_cstr(env, "load:*modules*");
00247   if (modules){
00248     modules = dfsch_car(modules);
00249   }
00250 
00251   if (search_modules(modules, name)){
00252     return NULL;
00253   }
00254 
00255   return dfsch_load(env, name, path_list);
00256 }
00257 
00258 void dfsch_provide(dfsch_object_t* env, char* name){
00259   dfsch_object_t* modules = dfsch_env_get_cstr(env, "load:*modules*");
00260   if (modules){
00261     modules = dfsch_car(modules);
00262   }
00263 
00264   if (search_modules(modules, name)){
00265     dfsch_error("Module already provided", dfsch_make_string_cstr(name));
00266   }
00267 
00268 
00269   /*
00270    * there should be define - module list is related to environment, but
00271    * this distinction is in most cases totally irrelevant, because modules
00272    * are mostly loaded into toplevel environment.
00273    */
00274   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "load:*modules*", 
00275                     dfsch_cons(dfsch_make_string_cstr(name),
00276                                modules));
00277 }
00278 
00279 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_load_extend_path(dfsch_object_t* ctx, char* dir){
00280   dfsch_object_t* path = dfsch_env_get_cstr(ctx, "load:*path*");
00281   if (path){
00282     dfsch_set_cstr(ctx, "load:*path*", 
00283                    dfsch_append(dfsch_list(2,
00284                                            dfsch_car(path),
00285                                            dfsch_list(1,
00286                                                       dfsch_make_string_cstr(dir)))));
00287   }else{
00288     dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "load:*path*", 
00289                      dfsch_list(1, dfsch_make_string_cstr(dir)));
00290   }
00291 }

00293 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_read_scm(char* scm_name, dfsch_object_t* eval_env){
00294   FILE* f = fopen(scm_name,"r");
00295   char buf[8193];
00296   import_ctx_t ictx;
00297   ssize_t r;
00298   int err=0;
00299   dfsch_object_t *obj;
00300 
00301   if (!f){
00302     dfsch_operating_system_error("fopen");
00303   }
00304 
00305   obj = dfsch_read_scm_stream(f, scm_name, eval_env);
00306 
00307   fclose(f);
00308     
00309   return obj;
00310 }
00311 
00312 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_read_scm_fd(int f, char* name, dfsch_object_t* eval_env){
00313   char buf[8193];
00314   import_ctx_t ictx;
00315   ssize_t r;
00316   int err=0;
00317 
00318   ictx.head = NULL;
00319 
00320   dfsch_parser_ctx_t *parser = dfsch_parser_create();
00321   dfsch_parser_callback(parser, load_callback, &ictx);
00322   dfsch_parser_eval_env(parser, eval_env);
00323 
00324   while (!err && (r = read(f, buf, 8192))>0){
00325     buf[r]=0;
00326     err = dfsch_parser_feed(parser,buf);
00327   }
00328 
00329   if (r<0){
00330     dfsch_operating_system_error("read");
00331   }
00332  
00333   if ((err && err != DFSCH_PARSER_STOPPED) 
00334       || dfsch_parser_get_level(parser) != 0){
00335     if (name)
00336       dfsch_error("Syntax error", dfsch_make_string_cstr(name));
00337     else
00338       dfsch_error("Syntax error", NULL);
00339 
00340   }
00341 
00342   return ictx.head;
00343   
00344 }
00345 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_read_scm_stream(FILE* f, 
00346                                       char* name, 
00347                                       dfsch_object_t* eval_env){
00348   char buf[8193];
00349   import_ctx_t ictx;
00350   ssize_t r;
00351   int err=0;
00352   int l=0;
00353 
00354   ictx.head = NULL;
00355 
00356   dfsch_parser_ctx_t *parser = dfsch_parser_create();
00357   dfsch_parser_callback(parser, load_callback, &ictx);
00358   dfsch_parser_set_source(parser, dfsch_make_string_cstr(name));
00359   dfsch_parser_eval_env(parser, eval_env);
00360 
00361   while (!err && (fgets(buf, 8192, f))){
00362     if (buf[strlen(buf)-1] == '\n') 
00363       // I'm not interested in '\r' or any other weird ideas
00364       l++;
00365 
00366     err = dfsch_parser_feed(parser,buf);
00367   }
00368 
00369   if ((err && err != DFSCH_PARSER_STOPPED) 
00370       || dfsch_parser_get_level(parser)!=0){
00371     if (name)
00372       dfsch_error("Syntax error",
00373                   dfsch_cons(dfsch_make_string_cstr(name),
00374                              dfsch_make_number_from_long(l)));
00375     else
00376       dfsch_error("Syntax error",
00377                   dfsch_cons(NULL,
00378                              dfsch_make_number_from_long(l)));
00379   }
00380 
00381   return ictx.head;
00382 }

00384 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(load_scm, NULL){
00385   char* file_name;
00386 
00387   args = dfsch_eval_list(args, env);
00388   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, file_name);
00389   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00390 
00391   return dfsch_load_scm(env, file_name);
00392 }
00393 
00394 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(load_so, NULL){
00395   char* sym_name;
00396   char* so_name;
00397 
00398   args = dfsch_eval_list(args, env);
00399   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, so_name);
00400   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, sym_name);
00401   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00402 
00403   return dfsch_load_so(env, so_name, sym_name);
00404 }
00405 
00406 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(load, NULL){
00407   char* name;
00408   dfsch_object_t* path_list;
00409 
00410   args = dfsch_eval_list(args, env);
00411   DFSCH_STRING_OR_SYMBOL_ARG(args, name);
00412   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, path_list, NULL)
00413   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00414 
00415   return dfsch_load(env, name, path_list);  
00416 }
00417 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(require, NULL){
00418   char* name;
00419   dfsch_object_t* path_list;
00420 
00421   args = dfsch_eval_list(args, env);
00422   DFSCH_STRING_OR_SYMBOL_ARG(args, name);
00423   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, path_list, NULL)
00424   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00425 
00426   return dfsch_require(env, name, path_list);  
00427 }
00428 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(provide, NULL){
00429   char* name;
00430 
00431   args = dfsch_eval_list(args, env);
00432   DFSCH_STRING_OR_SYMBOL_ARG(args, name);
00433   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00434 
00435   dfsch_provide(env, name);  
00436   return NULL;
00437 }

00439 static dfsch_object_t* native_read_scm(void *baton, dfsch_object_t* args,
00440                                        dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00441   char* filename;
00442   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, filename);
00443 
00444   return dfsch_read_scm(filename, NULL);
00445 }

00448 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_load_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00449   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "load:*path*", 
00450                     dfsch_list(3, 
00451                                dfsch_make_string_cstr("."),
00452                                dfsch_make_string_cstr(DFSCH_LIB_SCM_DIR),
00453                                dfsch_make_string_cstr(DFSCH_LIB_SO_DIR)));
00454   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "load:*modules*", NULL);
00455   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "load:scm!",  DFSCH_FORM_REF(load_scm));
00456   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "load:read-scm",
00457                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_read_scm,ctx));
00458   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "load:so!", DFSCH_FORM_REF(load_so));
00459   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "load!", DFSCH_FORM_REF(load));
00460   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "require", DFSCH_FORM_REF(require));
00461   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "provide", DFSCH_FORM_REF(provide));
00462   return NULL;
00463 }
